thread.title: Another year, another stay at this boutique hotel
thread.title_full: Another year, another stay at this boutique hotel - Review of Hotel Le Royal, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Marnie09
title: Another year, another stay at this boutique hotel
text:
Whenever we visit Paris we stay at this pleasant hotel. The staff is warm, friendly and helpful. We were greeted most every day by Ivana in September & she was charming. We love the location, the great restaurants in the area, the m√©tro around the corner, the neon, the hustle and bustle of Paris. The restaurants - some are neighborhood ones and some are tourist book recommended which have been around forever - are a nice mix and meet our needs after a busy day of walking and sightseeing. Within walking distance of Jardins du Luxenbourg & nice boutiques.
Room Tip: We love the front of the hotel so we can feel like we are part of the neighborhood. We open the wind... See more room tips
